pages.title: A Blade of Blood
pages.text: Crimson Fang is a rapier imbued with vampiric energy, allowing its wielder to drain life from enemies.

pages.title: Base Form
pages.text: Every strike from Crimson Fang restores a small amount of health to the user.

pages.title: Upgraded Form
pages.text: When infused with Lilithâ€™s Soul, it gains Vampiric Wrath, increasing attack power when at full health.

pages.title: Weapon Info
pages.text: A blade designed for the bloodthirsty, drawing power from its victims.
